attributes.action: to set up a Public Enquiry to investigate the effects of the drug diethylstilboestrol(DES) on women
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: (DES (diethylstilboestrol) is a synthetic oestrogen that was prescribed to pregnant women in the UK between approximately 1950 and 1975). Women  need to know if they were exposed to this Drug and they need to know all the consequences for them and their children and grandchildren. The government statistics are hopelessly out of date and information is not freely or widely made available by the government.
